PROPER_NAME: This is displayed in the tooltip.
DESCRIPTION: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should not be used be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).
Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
Tag referenced by other cards. Tearlaments tend to get effects when discarded.
Tag referenced by other cards. Kashtiras tend to be expensive, but immediately powerful.
Tag referenced by other cards. Scareclaws tend to be cheap and become stronger the more scareclaws you play.
Tag referenced by other cards. Mannadiums tend to make other cards easier to play.
Transform a card into into the previewed card for the rest of the combat. Keeps upgrades upon fusing.
Transform a card in your discard pile into the previewed card for the rest of the combat and shuffles it into the draw pile. Keeps upgrades upon fusing.
Send X card(s) from the draw pile to the discard pile.
Choose X Exhausted card(s) and put them in your hand.
Transform this card into the previewed card for the rest of the combat and shuffles it into the draw pile. Keeps upgrades upon fusing.
Can be obtained from evolving a creature. Elites are Creatures.
Cost 0 [R] if it's the first X card played.
Chose 1 of random 3 cards to add to hand.
Cost 1 less [R] per creature card played this turn.
Choose X card(s) from your draw pile and put them in your hand.
